message: I am glad that it is working for you. There is a technique to display classic-style breadcrumbs when a Fluid theme is enabled. You can check Matthew Haavisto’s blog post on how to do this. Method 2 in the post may help solve your requirement. I have also demonstrated a similar technique on how to display breadcrumbs when you are using a Fluid theme. You can check out the post “Where in the Fluid Am I?” to get the details on this. In the post I demonstrate how a bookmarklet can be used to invoke the breadcrumb modal. However, it is quite possible that you can use the System Branding Options to configure a script to fetch the breadcrumbs rather than having to use a bookmarklet.
